Replies.Reply: How ya doin', Papa, you doin' alright?
This is just a check-up, okay?
Here is money. I can get more. So much more. Take it, please.
What else can I give you, do for you?
We are alive because of you.
My children. His children. So many.
Bless you, Tuvia Bielski. May the Lord bless you and keep you all the days of your life.
That wasn't a man. That was an angel.
Papa and Mama. They killed them.
Are you going back to the army?
What is it like? To be in a war?
Zus finished the last of the sausage.
We know these woods. They'll never find us in here.
You know what Papa would do when you did that at table...
Koscik has a pistol. He showed it to me once.
Then we are the Bielski Otriad.
Malbin says the Piznarksi granary is full. We need two guns at least...
Leave half. He can't go to the Germans empty-handed.
No. I mean, yes. All right.
Behold thou art consecrated unto me by this ring according to the Laws of Moses and Israel.
There is talk of returning to the ghetto.
They've barely eaten in days. Even when our food missions manage to get through, there are armed patrols.
The partisans have ampicillin. But they say they need it for themselves.
Then why am I to be punished...?
Fischer is with them. So is Levine.
--and they spread rumors, that you are power-hungry and corrupt, that you take whatever woman you choose--
--that we keep gold for ourselves, and that--
...that you drink too much and are no longer fit to lead us.
Zus would have punched him senseless.
We found this in his pouch.
Don't they have a war to fight?
I could say the same about you.
I wouldn't show this around. There are some who'd turn you in for less.
Get them out of the bunkers!
We need to hold them off...until the rest are safe.
Lazar, Rosa, and Schmuel. There and there.
Nothing is impossible! What we have done is impossible!
God will not part these waters. We will do it ourselves.
Not by miracles. By our strength.
Take the rope from your pack.
We'll link arms. Make a chain. A human chain.
Hope at least you killed a few.
So why exactly have you come back?
I have run from the police my whole life. Do you really think it's a good time to stop?
We want food. Be quick about it!
If I hit you once more, you will shit your pants. Twice and you will never shit again.
He's lucky I didn't crush his head.
Fucking Polack. I've eaten shit from these people long enough!
He always had it in for Papa.
So we will go and ask him if he did.
One pistol isn't enough. We need rifles. Machine guns.
I send you for food and you bring more mouths to feed.
Did you at least get the gun?
Then we'll have to make them count.
To kill them. It was good, no?
What are we going to do with these others?
The women will slow us down. And your old teacher--
We have to be able to keep moving, and quickly.
And how will we feed this family?
And this one, is she family?
Tuvia, this is Rona. Rona is my forest wife.
Hello, boys, what can we do for you?
These little shits are holding us up.
You little shits have the balls to shoot me?
I want to see if this little shit will shoot me. You like shooting Jews, you little shit?
No. We're the Gestapo, you little shit.
Or perhaps you'd prefer I shove them up your ass.
You know a woman there, Sonia Bielski?
I thought they'd be safe. I should have been with them.
We will kill all the Germans you can handle. Starting tonight.
If you're not afraid to use that rifle.
Blood for blood. You had your revenge.
No. Only YOU can play God. Save a few lives, take a few others...
Are you coming with us or not?
WE ARE THE BIELSKI OTRIAD! WE ARE  JEWS! YOU LIKE TO KILL JEWS! HERE  WE ARE! WE ARE THE BIELSKI'S!
He was pissing on my head.
Peretz, Jacov, check the car for guns...
I'll check his pockets for more ammo.
How'd you get past the Lazar?
He walked right by you! Someone could have been killed!
If we were real partisans he'd be shot.
Koscik, put your pants back on and leave those sheep alone.
What's killing me is all your talking. Back to work.
Good morning, friend. Getting an early start to market? Could you possibly spare us a bit of milk?
We are so grateful, comrade, for your cooperation. What a lovely coat. Is that a fur collar?
Lazar, you can see it's us, you idiot. You only ask, 'who goes there' when you don't know who it is.
Blintzes! You will make me blintzes!
There aren't enough for the men.
THERE ARE HUNDREDS OF US! WHO IS  THE FOOL?
Next one is to the head!
Next time just draw them a map.
It means -- we should have killed the fucking milkman. Your policy of diplomacy is shit.
...Two are dead. Winter is coming and now we have no shelter. Why?
I'll take the two on the left...
And if it is a hundred? Six hundred?
And when the Germans follow these hundreds and slaughter us.
Pan Tuvia. Rabbi Tuvia. Allow me to kiss your hand...
You think Pachenko wants hundreds more of us in the forest?
And who is it that's risking our family, and for what? For the sake of these--
That's who comes to us from the ghetto. Empty clothes.

Pretentious Jews. Jews who stuck up their noses and wouldn't give us the time of day when we passed them on the street. Jews who went out of their way to keep their daughters locked away from our dirty hands.
You think your old teacher will give you a good grade because you saved his worthless ass! They accept you as their leader only because they are too weak and full of shit to help themselves.
Good. I'll dance at your wedding.
Get up! Move! SHOOT OR I'LL SHOOT  YOU...
'A Jew can't drink, a Jew can't fight.' What is it we are good at, Viktor? Dying. That is what we are good at.
I know who you mean... The Great Tuvia Bielski. Savior of the Jews and all around Big Shit.
He is a Big Shit also?
There would be medicine in the police headquarters at Stankiewcze, yes?
Tuvia and I grew up there.
Perhaps the Bielski otriad will volunteer to take out the transmitter.
Stay with the truck. And make sure it's in gear when we get back.
I have been given this mission by my superior officer.
Fighters die so that malbushim may live, that's what you believe, yes?
Communist, Zionist, Manicurist, what difference does it make? You got your medicine.
Lova, what happened? Who did this?
I want to report the mistreatment of a comrade.
This man beat Comrade Lova -- for no reason at all.
Anti-semitism is a violation of Party discipline.
Let's just say the former owner no longer had need of it.
Wolnicky stores ammunition for us in his barn. There's no guard.
You want them to find Tuvia's camp.
You're deliberately sacrificing them so we can remain safe?
And if we cannot hold the position?
Perhaps you have room for one more?
They are looking for you people.
Sure, sure. Take what you want...
And no news of my brothers?
If you stay, you'll have to go to the ghetto.
I need to see to my family. Will you come?
If I was a German you are dead.
It wasn't war. It was something else.
Where is Sonia and the baby?
Is there anything left to eat?
You think Wilencki is going to give us food?
He was willing to help us.
This is your plan? To terrorize every anti-Semite in Belorussia?
We don't know he did it.
We don't know he did it.
Machine guns? You're going to take on the whole German army?
I'll go ask Koscik for food.
He said the same of you.
What am I supposed to do with--
--And feed them how? I can't care for my own family.
Those men? They were the ones who killed my parents?
Zus. He's with the other two.
For a dumb schoolboy, you mean.
It is just like school, I don't know what you're talking about.
And you know why I am here.
You have no idea what I'm talking about...
And it's a good job, isn't it? You like your job.
My father? You don't talk about my father...
For my parents, David and Beila Bielski... for my brothers and all the others--
Riboynoy shel oylam, riboynoy shel oylam...
Lord of the universe, forgive me, I have murdered -- but they were monsters and did not deserve to live.
You're afraid he's going to beat you for forgetting your homework.
We'll sleep farther up the trail.
I know. I know... Tamara, you remember Cousin Zus. Please, go sit down by the fire. And this is Lazar -- Isabel's youngest...
This is Isaac Malbin. From Minsk.
Asael, find them something to eat.
Fuck me! Have you never used a hammer?
What is it you do, then?
As long as his village wife stays in hiding.
This is all the food we have. You are welcome to share.
Come. Sit. Put down your guns.
--we must get what we need without killing. We can't make more enemies--
--It won't bring your family back to life. Or Mama. Or Papa.
And I can still see their faces.
So this is God's work you're doing, Zussie?
You are making the decisions now?
Stupid! The gunfire could be heard for miles.
Again I have no idea what you are talking about.
I know we have no food. But tomorrow... tomorrow will be another mission.
That was a mistake! But the mistakes we made will not be made again!
We could be here a long time. And we have to prepare.
Better security. Better at getting food and information--
--at making shelters. Whatever is needed. We all participate. We don't work against each other.
I want to kill Nazis, too, but we...just...cannot afford revenge.
...We will map out where we've been so as to not visit the same farms too often. And we take only from those who can afford to give, and leave those who can't alone.
True. But what I am saying is...
We need to know what's going on in the villages, how the Germans patrol, who the informers are--
You spent three days in a cellar!
You go along, just to make sure he understands my orders.
We have to dig a trench around the new zemylanka. If it rains I'm afraid water will seep in.
She was a beautiful woman. But cold. Not a day went by she didn't remind me I wasn't a good provider.
ONLY FOOD AND GUNS! FOLLOW ASAEL!
Lova, Ben Zion -- stay with us.
Isaac, keep them moving! Zus, Asael, Ben Zion...
You are from Belarussia, pig! Why do you work for the Germans against your own people?
Soon it will be dark... See how you find your way home then!
We have to find a new camp.
Rest and eat. I need volunteers for a scouting party.
A brigade of independent fighters searching for our comrades.
We belong to the Bielski otriad.
I'm sure we can clear up this misunderstanding with your commander.
When you take food it is from loyal supporters. When we do, you call it stealing.
And we fight a common enemy. The motherland doesn't distinguish between Jews and non-Jews.
We are honored to be of service.
As if we have a choice.
I haven't read one in years.
I wasn't a very good student. You can ask Shimon.
Yet you accept me as Commander.
You have more ideas? About all this?
We must send for whoever is left alive.
No. I'll bring them out myself.
I cannot have you contradicting me... Not when others are around.
--You think she'd be with you if it wasn't for what is happening here?
You are the man of her dreams? The Romeo of Novagrudok?
There are rumors. Of death camps.
What if we were to take all of you?
We will protect you. We have made alliances with the Russian Partisans.
YOU WANT TIME? Fine, I give you a day. A month. Maybe a year. To live!
Your daughter is out there with us.
Your husband is waiting for you.
See if you can fix this trigger.
Friends, we are happy to see you safely among us. But there are many things you must learn about living here...
Once you are settled, you'll be assigned work duties. Everyone works, no exceptions.
We will help supply the Russian Partisans by making clothes, repairing guns.
Women will learn to use weapons and fight alongside men.
This is not a gun. It is Bar Kochba's spear. It is Ehud's sword.
...This is the one place in all of Belorussia where a Jew can be free.
We will make again, here in this forest, the life that was taken from you. We welcome you into our community.
Send out more missions. And bring shotguns.
I will have Asael send someone else.
You know how to use this?
Lazar. I am coming from camp. The danger is from those coming to camp.
No sign of the food mission?
Medicine for typhus. I heard you.
We have sickness. I need ampicillin.
If typhus breaks out in our camp, it may spread to yours.
You don't have to do this.
So more die. They will anyway.
So you're a communist now, Zus?
Policy is...Same for all. If someone is stealing he'll face consequences.
This matter is settled. Everybody back in line.
WHAT ARE YOU LOOKING AT? BACK IN  LINE!
...the way they look at me... with their pasty faces. Let them starve, we're all going to die out here anyway.
And you've nursed me the whole time?
Did you study nursing at university?
My wife's father had a store. Before the Race Laws.
I'd love to hear you play.
Who doesn't? Chopin the butcher from Novogrudok.

As long as I am the leader of this group, you will obey my commands.  THERE WILL BE NO MORE COMPLAINING!  NO MORE SITTING! NO MORE DOING  NOTHING. ANYONE WANTS TO LEAVE, THEY LEAVE. NOW! The rest work. Every morning we get up and we work. WE WORK. In the snow and the cold and the dark. Tomorrow we begin to build ten new zemylanka, we double the number of food missions. ...We work.
Take his body into the woods and leave it for the wolves.
Get a message to Zus. He's got to tell Viktor they're coming.
I cannot keep the living alive.
The Germans are coming into the forest. I don't know what is going to become of us.
Reeboynoy shel oylum... Lord of the Universe. We have done unspeakable things yet still I seek your mercy...
We can't fight an entire division.
We've done our part for the Motherland.
And the others? Old people, women and children.
--He left before Pharaoh could stop them.
We leave now. Spread the word.
Don't try to fight... Just slow them down. Then join us.
Use it on yourself before you let them take you.
Each person takes care of the other.
No tracks on land. Get back in.
Not a sound. Pass the word.
Only weapons and ammunition! Spread the word.
Lilka, please help. We've got to get the injured into the forest.
Everybody gather your things! We have to get out of the open!
Where is the rest of your unit?
We've got to build a new camp.
They are used to trouble, they'll be all right.
I can get false papers and pass as a gentile. So can you.
Will you at least stay tonight?
I am Avram Rubinski. This is my daughter. She-- The Germans--
They kept her for a week.
Zus has moved out of earshot. Tuvia joins him.
The German lets loose a torrent of pleading.
Your father was a good man.
To the dead. God rest their souls.
I live with this, can you imagine?
Hunting can work up a thirst.
A Jew is worth that much? Do you pay more for a fat one?
Do I look like an idiot? Don't answer so quickly...
Take a look. And clean out the cow shit while you're back there.
--If the laborers find them tomorrow, I will be denounced--
You people. Why is it so fucking hard to be friends with a Jew?
Hunting Jews. Our new bosses are very organized.
Fifteen in one day. The council is offering a year's free tax for every one you turn in. -
Caught five of them hiding in a ditch. Smelled so bad I was afraid the Germans wouldn't want them.
We missed two when we visited the parents.
Anybody caught helping them is in for it. You know this, Koscik?
Been at it since dawn. The wife doesn't like these long nights.
Bribing an officer of the law?
You'll keep your eyes open, yes?
If they say find someone, I find him. It's my job.
In school. I am Shimon H'aretz.
I heard them speaking of your parents. I am very sorry.
And the other brothers? What was his name, the wild one?
You are hiding here? In the forest?
There has been trouble before maybe?
So now you go to the forest. A wise choice.
My whole life I presumed to teach others the right way to live. I had no doubt: this is God's way, this isn't. You'll forgive me if recent events have somewhat shaken my resolve.
The little one does not talk?
They thought you were bringing food.
The Talmud says if you save a life you must take responsibility for it.
In the West a monster with a little mustache, in the East a monster with a big mustache. This is all I need to know about politics.
No. The messiahs are all in politics, and they're killing us.
My life in these woods is much easier because of Mr. Roosevelt, thank you.
All your secular learning, yet you know nothing of life.
And for every fact that goes in your head, another comes out your rear end.
Yes. You annoy me therefore I exist.
By my best calculation, today is High Holiday. I am fasting.
I am sorry for your loss.
Do you want to say the Kaddish?
A great rabbi once said, "wherever I go, I am always going to the land of Israel."
That should come in handy. Next...
Merciful God, we commit our friends Ben Zion and Krensky to your care.
We have paid for each of your Commandments. We have covered every field and stone with ashes. Sanctify another land.
Choose another people. Teach them the Deeds and the Prophecies. Grant us but one more blessing -- Take back the gift of our holiness.
From the bottom of the pot.
Not easy being the big boss. Moses was a lonely man when he led us out of bondage.
So I'm a sucker for a biblical allusion. But what is society without leaders. Without leaders, we falter.
Neither was Moses, but somehow that seemed to work out.
I call it an inevitable conclusion based on unimpeachable reasoning.
The question, my friend the Genius, is what are you going to do about it.
Who would make a move like that?
They've assigned an entire division to surround the forest.
He says he has a wife and children.
Sie mussen versprechen nicht zu sagan wo wir sind.
And so tomorrow we celebrate the Passover by sitting around and arguing just as we have done for centuries.
No. The physical plane is where man acts to redeem himself.
Look who's talking about shutting up... I need to tell you something.
You shouldn't think so much. The world around you is beautiful.
I almost lost...my faith....but you...were sent..by God..to save us.
I know... ... But just...in case... .I thank....HIM... .and I thank you.
Tomorrow is Sunday. You have a day off, yes?
I was always fair with your family.
DON'T BE A FOOL. THERE ARE HUNDREDS  OF US!
MAYBE I KNOW YOU. SHOW YOURSELF!
Give us Bielski and the rest of you can go free!
You are from Lida! Is Isadore Korein alive?
Pardon me, you are from Vilna. My sister lives on Passaya Street.
There are so many in the ghetto, I don't know...
There at least we had hope...
The poorest farmer has more than us.
Gramov. Two others. I used the officer's latrine.
They said they wouldn't shit in the same hole as a Jew.
What are we doing here? Zus?
Tell me. Who are we doing this for?
Does anyone have news from Vilna?
At least here we are safe.
You get rid of them quicker if you boil them.
Yesterday, potatoes with beets, Today, beets with potatoes. Special treat tomorrow...potato soup. With beets.
I've kept it hidden for months but now it's obvious. No one can know.
I--- It was when I was escaping. A man with a gun stopped me. I thought he was a Partisan. He told me to follow him and he took me to this place...
Inside me something broke....I wanted to die. Every night I have nightmares -- what will happen when Tuvia finds out.
I feel this new life inside me.
I suppose...you'd have to say...I was...am...an intellectual.
Nice to know there are some things even Hitler can't destroy.
You're trying to tell me all politics is meaningless.
Your messiah will have a mustache, too, and a full beard.
And Roosevelt? He has no mustache.
Even Spinoza said existence can be substantiated by empirical evidence.
How can you say this? Learning is my life.
Descartes at least provided for the subjective nature of experience.
Where is he taking us? My feet are going to fall off.
Well, maybe rabbis should give better directions.
If my friends at The New Socialists' Club could see me now...
I haven't read a book in months.
We need to be strong, but--
And now they belong to the otriad.
I'm thinking about what I'm going to do about it.
You didn't get me. You think you got me? How about this?
Ask if he'll promise not to reveal our location.
You want to move them all? The old, the sick. They'll never make it.
Shimon, listen to me, the physical plane is just an illusion. Only the spiritual plane is real.
You've redeemed yourself enough, you should shut up now.
We haven't eaten in two days. My name is Peretz, this is Jacov.
Two days ago there were three thousand Jews in Horodyszcze. Now there are fifty. Me and him, we hid in a wall.
What is the name of your otriad?
We heard the Russians are beginning to organize.
--But you need a gun to join them.
They were on their way to a party!
My truck! WHO DID THIS TO MY TRUCK?
You don't understand. They made me give them my truck...
It's one of ours, but no one is here. Maybe he was drunk?
Move it off the road before the convoy passes. I'll report the sonuvabitch.
LEAVE NOW AND WE WON'T SHOOT THE  REST OF YOU!
This is not a gun. It is Bar Kochba's spear. It is Ehud's sword.
The new ones, they are from Novagroduk. Your wife--
They say...She was killed last week.
I'M FROM KARELITZ, TOO. I LIVED BY  THE SLAUGHTER HOUSE.
Look what happened the last time.
More young bodies to keep us warm.
Jacob's ladders. Like in his dream.
If we had some dynamite we could blow the shit out of it.
--and then we fell into this horrible bog. Chaya saved me. Honestly, I can't swim at all.
We must have got lost a dozen times.
Tell him, Chaya. Was it not the absolute worst? And that farmer, Mr. Koscik, kept making the most vulgar jokes, he said any girl who--
Milk, eggs -- Chaya, our brave men have brought us a feast!
You have lipstick? Please, I know you have some left.
I'm a little scared out here.
Why is there a rule against women having guns?
You will take good care of me? You will be my commander.
Tamara, come on in, it's freezing and slimy and horrible.
... So last night I dreamed I was taking a real bath. With hot water.
Doesn't take a fortune teller to know what Lilka's dreaming about...
So...a little bird told me that a certain someone is waiting...for another certain someone to ask a certain question... Go on...
Use the sand. It's good for your skin.
When we get out of this forest I am going to eat only cake and grow as big as a house.
My son's name was David. David Kagan.
He was fifteen. He had blue eyes.
The Germans will be here any minute!
Hey, Arkady This isn't soup, it's piss.
No? We were told, 'hands off,' property of the Commander.
This is what I'm required to give the Germans. If I don't meet my quota they'll shoot me and my family.
For the same reason you steal from the poor. To survive.
I don't think we've been properly introduced. Arkady Lubczanski.
You are getting along all right?
You'll have it by tonight. Something nice and soft.
I couldn't help but notice you don't have a husband yet.
Most of the woman have already chosen. They haven't told you about this?
We love potatoes, don't we, boys!
Next time, I cut off your nose, pisher.
Those who risk their lives to bring back food deserve a larger portion than those who risk nothing.
Not when you're serving, pisher. I see you digging to the bottom of the pot for your little forest cutie and her parents...
I will piss on your head and you will say it's raining. Eat it. The rest of Lubczanski's cabal laughs.
New policy. Fighters get better food.
You are no longer Commander. Sorry.
Oh. Well... Yes, that would be nice.
No. But thank you for explaining it.
I've seen you looking at me. If you were to rescue them, I would do... anything...you--
Oh, take me to that dream!
Wash clothes? I... don't think so.
Who has the soap? I know there was a little left?
And you were always so worried about staying slim.
ARON RUNS through the woods like a deer. She follows.
We know of you. Jewish bandits.
I had a perfectly good reason. He is a Jew.
I am Viktor Panchenko, commander of the October otriad. We have had complaints of a Jewish gang stealing from villages loyal to us.
How do you respond to these charges?
We will see. Select your best fighters and send them to us.
More dead soldiers than empty bottles.
At least you drink like one.
So tell me about this brother of yours...
My older brother and I have the same relationship.
He was killed in the first hour of the German invasion.
--and every time we try to move, they radio back to police HQ which houses the transmitter...here.
Yes, yes, my Hebrew warrior. Except for the troops in Stankiewcze and the machine guns out front.

I will have to take that chance.

Have your men in my camp by tonight.
No. So we can keep fighting.
I am your brother! He is your brother! Comrade Zus. Your Jewish sentimentality is heart-warming, but counter-revolutionary.

Please, Tuvia. The baby is all she has to live for.
She was raped by the Nazis.
...You tell us to hold onto our humanity. Not to become like animals. What better way than by bringing a life into this world of suffering and death. It's our only hope.

I'm not afraid of anything, Tuvia.
